author: Daniel Micallef
comment: I am able to use this app however it is very user unfriendly. The following must be improved:  1. Start/Stop button. The app will start counting down time immediately when opened  2. Worst of all if I do not constantly touch the watch the app face disappears and my watch face (normal time) appears, whilst the app works in the background. This totally disables me from focusing on my workout.  Finally user interface should be improved. Before reading the app update I never knew I could customize the timings and cycles etc.

author: Remmie M
comment: Simple. Nice. Doesn't vibrate when done a part. Please add vibration maybe even one custom pattern. If you do I'll give five 🌟

author: GT
comment: Cannot get to sync to watch.

author: Josh McCracken
comment: This app would be pretty awesome, except for the fact that as soon as I start the app it starts the countdown timer. It would make much more sense to be able to start the app and then hit a start button to begin to work out.

reply.author: Rachel Xiang
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback! I'll definitely work on adding that feature. I'm stilling getting a feel for android development, but feel free to let me know if you have any other suggestions. :)

title: Needs work
